entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse https://t.co/Q6gY4dOfF4 11am GMT, the UK is holding a minutes silence for the key workers whom have lost their lives to COVID-19 whilst caring for others, what’s Trump and his admin doing.....56,000 deaths and counting on Trumps watch.
